data.text:
I had been sitting at my desk for a while, but 
I was still worried about Marvelous Sunday. I 
decided to go to the infirmary to check on her――
Haa…… Haa…… ……Ugh……
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: Mmm…… mmmmm……
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Huh…… Trainer……? 
……Ahaa, seems like, I'm still dreaming……
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: I'm glad…… being alone, isn't marvelous after all……
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Maybe it's because she just woke up, but Marvelous 
Sunday seemed a little out of it. Wondering if she 
was okay, I talked to her because she seemed depressed.

Hmmmm~…… a long time ago……the same dream I'd had 
while I was hospitalized…… It was dark……in a place 
where I couldn't see anything…… and very cold――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
I hated being alone, so I'd just start walking. 
I didn't know where to go, but I kept moving forward.
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
When I did, eventually I could see a light far in 
the distance…… A warm looking place……if I went 
there, maybe I'd find someone to hold me tight――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Without realizing it, I started running. But 
that light kept getting further away…… No matter 
how much I wanted to go there, to reach it――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: I ran…… I ran with all my strength…… I just ran――!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
When I opened my eyes, Papa and Mama were crying. 
Grandma praised me, saying I had worked hard.
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
They told us you might not open your eyes again. 
But just like your name, you showed us a wonderful miracle……
data.name: Marvelous' Grandmother

data.text:
Marvelous is a miracle――joy――a wonderous surprise. 
To us, you just being here is Marvelous, you know.
data.name: Marvelous' Grandmother

data.text: That was when I realized it――!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Being born, being alive, running. Just sharing a connection with 
someone, that that would make everything more joyous for everyone.
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
That something miraculous, that wonderful surprises exist! 
Even if you can't see or feel it, they're all around……!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Right! Marvelous is something special, amazing, a wonderful 
surprise! That's what I wanted to show Trainer!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Because showing everyone that kind of Marvelous is my dream☆ 
That's why I came to Tracen Academy, after all!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
At some point, the strength had returned to 
her eyes. Maybe it was because she remembered 
her promise to show me what Marvelous was.

You see, the world is filled with people like Trainer. 
Lots of people that don't realize what Marvelous is.
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
It can't be seen so they don't know…… in that case, 
I want to show them! That's why I decided to enter races!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
There's alot of Marvelous things in races, after all☆ 
Passion……excitement……emotions, and many other special, 
wonderful surprises that can't be found elsewhere!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
A wonderful surprise――if she put it that way, 
then I felt I could understand what 『Marvelous』 meant.
Like with the waxed hallway――

That Mystery Tea. You didn't know what flavor it 
had until you drank it. Marvelous Sunday considered 
all these little surprises to be something special.

I had thought my life was boring. But I never even tried 
to see the beauty in everyday life, thinking that 
I'd be disappointed if the world itself didn't shine.

But, there were many wonderful surprises in my life, and I just had 
to look for them. If I did, then my world would definitely shine!

Whether your days were exciting or unforgettable, it 
all depended on how you saw it. Even those days I spent 
thinking and worrying about the meaning of Marvelous――

Were fun…… those days after coming to Tracen were fulfilling! 
The thing I found marvelous――the wonderful surprise, was her!

I wanted the world to know about Marvelous Sunday. By 
supporting her, I wanted her feelings to reach everyone.

That the world around you is overflowing 
with marvelous things. If that's her dream――

choices.text: ……Will you let me help with that dream?
choices.processed: <size=40>……Will you let me help with that dream?</size>

choices.text: ……Will you let me help with that dream?
choices.processed: <size=40>……Will you let me help with that dream?</size>

data.text: Trainer is going to help!? But, but, how are you gonna do that!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

choices.text: Let me help with your training

data.text:
Normally, this kind of talk would be accompanied 
by talks of a contract. But, if she wanted to 
show everyone that, she couldn't stay as she was.

First, we need to increase her strength so she 
doesn't collapse during training. If she wanted to 
show everyone what Marvelous was, it was necessary.

Maybe she'd be dissatisfied if she was told to 
hold back. Maybe it would feel a bit like a 
detour. But, Marvelous Sunday might understand.

After all, even during that rainy day, 
she was able to find something marvelous――

Eh~, how? If it's raining this hard, we might not be able 
to train tomorrow either, you know? Maya wants to run!
data.name: Mayano Top Gun

data.text:
That's true, if you can't run because it's 
raining, it's boring, huh?☆ But if you wait, 
and wait, and wait a little more for the sun then――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Maybe by holding back on her desire to run 
during the rain, it would make the next time 
she was on the turf that much more exciting.

If the Marvelous she mentioned on that day was anything 
like that, maybe she'd understand what it meant 
to focus on efficiency to get better results later.

You'll help me with training!? If you do, will I be 
able to show that special Marvelous to everyone!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

choices.text: You'll be able to for sure!

data.text:
Her positivity would be a huge asset. If she could focus on 
that, she should be able to aim higher. Putting it that way――

Aim higher for a special Marvelous! If I show them that, 
then more people will realize what Marvelous is, right!?
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Trainer! I want everyone to see it☆ 
A special Marvelous that only I can show them★☆★
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
I had Marvelous Sunday take a break――and then several days 
later. Once again I was on the training course with her.

Haa……Haa……――Alright! 
On the next one, I'll use all of――☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
If she went all out here, nothing would change. 
The first thing she needed to learn was to manage her pace.

choices.text: Just maintain your speed for now!

data.text:
Ah, that's right! ……but, you see Trainer! 
It's strange, for some reason my heart won't stop beating!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
It just feels like that Marvelous feeling keeps building up☆ 
If I keep on building this up more and more then――
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Yeah, you're right! That's why right now……is 
the time to build up that Marvelous feeling!
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text: ――Then, Trainer, I'll be off☆
data.name: Marvelous Sunday

data.text:
Just as I instructed, Marvelous Sunday was 
running while maintaining her speed.

It seems like even she felt something from this training. 
In that case, I had high expectations.
